func.title: ShowInfo

param.name: obj
param.desc: Object for which to display information. If unspecified, the calling object will be used.

func.desc: Displays the description text of an object in a popup window (a menu window).
func.remark: The information window's background will be the definition image of the obect.

example.text: A feature for a special clonk: pressing the 'special' key will display the description of the first inventory item in a popup window. If the clonk does not carry any objects, the clonk's own description will be displayed.
